name: Traveler (Anemo)
description: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.
titles: Mr. Nice Guy/Ms. Nice Lady (by Teucer)

skills.name: Foreign Ironwind
skills.description:
Normal Attack: Performs up to 5 rapid strikes.

Charged Attack: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.
Plunging Attack: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Palm Vortex
skills.description:
Grasping the wind's might, you form a vortex of vacuum in your palm, causing Anemo DMG 6 times in 1.5 seconds to opponents in front of you. The vacuum vortex explodes when the skill duration ends, causing a greater amount of Anemo DMG over a larger area.

Hold: DMG and AoE will gradually increase.
Elemental Absorption: If the vortex comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro elements, it will deal 23% additional elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.
Generate 2 elemental particles when press and 3.5 when hold, if it hit at least 1 target.

skills.name: Gust Surge
skills.description:
Guiding the path of the wind currents, you summon a forward-moving tornado that pulls objects and opponents towards itself, dealing Anemo DMG each 0.5 seconds, 9 times.

Elemental Absorption: If the vortex comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro elements, it will deal 30.7% additional elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.

passives.name: Slitting Wind
passives.description: The last hit of a Normal Attack combo unleashes a wind blade, dealing 60% of ATK as Anemo DMG to all opponents in its path.

passives.name: Second Wind
passives.description: Palm Vortex kills regenerate 2% HP for 5s. This effect can only occur once every 5s.

constellations.name: Raging Vortex
constellations.description: Palm Vortex pulls in enemies within a 5m radius.

constellations.name: Sweeping Gust
constellations.description: Increases the level of Gust Surge by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Cherishing Breezes
constellations.description: Reduces DMG taken while casting Palm Vortex by 10%.

constellations.name: Vortex Stellaris
constellations.description: Increases the level of Palm Vortex by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Intertwined Winds
constellations.description:
Targets who take DMG from Gust Surge have their Anemo RES decreased by 20%.

If an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.
